Comment: I have taken my dog to this groomer for years and they always do an amazing job
Satisfaction:

Comment: They are very kind and patient with my dog, which is important because he can be quite anxious around new people
Satisfaction:

Comment: The groomer takes their time to make sure my dog looks great and is always willing to answer any questions I have
Satisfaction:

Comment: I would recommend this groomer to anyone!
Satisfaction:

Comment: This is the best grooming salon I've ever been to! The staff is incredibly friendly and knowledgeable. They took great care of my dog, who has a lot of fur, and did an excellent job cleaning him up. My dog was relaxed and happy when I picked him up, which is a huge plus. I highly recommend this place!
Satisfaction:

Comment: I have been taking my dog to this groomer for a while now and I have always been impressed with the service. The groomers are skilled and patient, especially with my dog who can be quite nervous around new people. They take their time to make sure my dog looks great and never rush through the process. The prices are also very reasonable. I would definitely recommend this groomer to others!
Satisfaction:

Comment: I had a very poor experience at this grooming salon. The groomer was not very experienced and made several mistakes while grooming my dog. The fur was left all over my house and furniture. I called to express my concerns and was met with dismissiveness and arrogance. I will not be returning to this groomer.
Satisfaction:

Comment: I took my dog to this groomer for the first time and was very disappointed. The groomer was rushing through the process and did not seem to pay attention to detail. My dog came out with matted fur and dirty paws. I will not be returning to this groomer.
Satisfaction:

Comment: I have been taking my dog to this groomer for years, but I have recently started having issues with the service. The groomers seem to be in a hurry and do not seem to care about the quality of their work. My dog has come out with cuts and bruises on multiple occasions. I am considering finding a new groomer.
Satisfaction:

Comment: My dog is always super excited to visit this groomer. I always have a positive experience here!
Satisfaction:

Comment: I had a very negative experience at this grooming salon. The groomer was unprofessional and made my dog uncomfortable. I called to express my concerns and was met with hostility and rudeness. I will not be returning to this groomer.

Comment: I have been taking my dog to this groomer for years, but I have noticed a decline in the quality of service recently. The groomers seem to be less experienced and the grooming job is not as good as it used to be. I am considering finding a new groomer.
